<title level="1" right="Rules">[Snares](/Rules.aspx?ID=1450)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 247 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
[Snares](/equipment/snares) are small, simple traps to damage or hamper your foes that you can create and deploy quickly enough to utilize on a battlefield. Snares are nonmagical consumable items. The full rules for creating and using snares are located [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=743).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
